channel.title: DataBasic
channel.googleplay:author: Warwick Data Science Society
channel.author: hello@wdss.io
channel.itunes:author: Warwick Data Science Society
channel.itunes:keywords: data, basic, databasic, science, podcast, university, of, warwick, society, student, simple, explained, teach, news, lesson, statistics, analytics, story, interview, expert, professional, industry, business
channel.description: A WDSS podcast, DataBasic aims to make the field of data science assessible and clear, cutting through the hype and showcasing the details you need to know
